Reviews.Title: “good budget hotel”

Reviews.Content: friend returned 3 night stay hotel reading reviews expecting pleasantly surprised building door main reception accessed buzzer system top building 51 steps day walking facing onto rear despite proximity railway overly bothered noise spacious basically furnished spotlessly clean beds comfortable little adequate sized towels provided waste sink fixing leaked mirror bedroom bathroomthere tv italian programs continental breakfast provided choice cereals bread toaster provided jams coffee tea bags fruit juices price 2 friendly staff placed 15 minute straight walk termini stay recommend clean basic

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic place to stay”
Reviews.Author: Raz86
Reviews.Content: reading negative reviews hotel bit apprehensive trip rome time perfect arrived hotel night surrounding looked dirty unfriendly little intimidating pleasantly surprised midi hotel buzzed door feel safe entering delighted clean reception staff spoke perfect english floor overlooking conservatory breakfast garden balcony sitting day walking handy partner smokes ash trays provided compact cosy comfortable bathroom tiny toilet awkwardly placed hard centre toilet shower wall cramped tall little awkward minor issue shower fixed shower head detachable water pressure corner shower leak afterwards towel dry water wasnt didnt tv mini bar sleep bed comfortable wasnt noise hotel dont noise recommend shutter glass doors lead onto balcony nice leave shutters warm night march breakfast pretty basic bread option toast pre packed croissants cereal juice ate breakfast day stayed didnt slept bit location hotel close termini station walking distance sights roma passes day recommend free entrance museums archeological free travel metro bus tram routes cost €25 valid days metro lot easy restaurant street via manzoni called red ate night food seriously nice reasonably priced staff welcoming friendly speak english italian love hear words italian italians effort help attempt language overall midi hotel fantastic base days spent rome location price perfect helpful staff whom extra mile help excellent time rome cant wait recommend hotel definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “This hotel is lovely, really!!!”
Reviews.Author: Ashleybradley
Reviews.Content: read bad comments regarding hotel travelled wasnt looking forward found hotel ideal clean en suite air conditioned lift floor anyway wasnt issue staff helpful polite personal remembering breakfast simple cereal toast pasta pizza bad quibble location trams outside didnt city centre walk termini metro tremendous issue remember reading reviews people expectations crash night found adequate expected maybe pleased pleased aspects hotel highly recommended consider
